entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -16.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 47 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -25.1°C
Wind: WNW 57 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:26 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
